notes: The PO_LINE_LOCATIONS_ALL table tracks detailed shipment schedules for each PO line. It allows splitting PO lines into multiple deliveries with unique dates, quantities, and destinations. It is critical for receiving (tracks QUANTITY_RECEIVED), invoice matching (QUANTITY_BILLED), and reporting on delivery/receipt performance. Each record represents a specific delivery instance tied to a line, and includes quantities for received, billed, rejected, and canceled goods. For backdated status, quantities are aggregated from rcv_transactions based on transaction_date.
